subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Lopez, a 7-foot center, joined Arron Afflalo, a 6-foot-5 guard, as the Knicks’ key acquisitions in free agency. He is expected to solidify the Knicks’ interior defense.
snippet: Lopez, a 7-foot center, joined Arron Afflalo, a 6-foot-5 guard, as the Knicks’ key acquisitions in free agency. He is expected to solidify the Knicks’ interior defense.
